ivar_sr schrieb:
> Thanks so much for the config information. I have merged my 
> configuration as I would like to go to a single site. Here is my 
> complete config with the merge but has validation problem. The 
> version that I'm using is 2.0.0
> 
> Problem:
> 
> Problem: No such key: root:controller:processors:HTTP:midfetch-
> rules:rules:1:regexp 
> 

I've forgotten to tell you: I'm using my own heritrix release, called
heritrix-2.0.0-OFFIS, based on the 2.0.0 release of the IA. Within the
2.0.0. there were some bugs concerning wrong or faulty initalization of
the keys. Some DecideRules are not initiallized correctly.

The problem:
Some Keys aren't populated to the KeyManager because of the missing
static-initalization block. I've fixed these issues in my release.
I think these bugs are also fixed in the 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT but I haven't
tested it. I also don't know how stable the actual 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT is, so
I decided to create a bugfix release based on the 2.0.0 code.
If someone whould like to mirror it I may provide the actual code.

Christian
